statements.sql: select `users`.`id`, `users`.`username`, `users`.`avatar`, `users`.`steamid64`, `users`.`is_admin`, SUM(games.price) as top_value, COUNT(games.id) as wins_count from `users` inner join `games` on `games`.`winner_id` = `users`.`id` group by `users`.`id` order by `top_value` desc limit 21
